SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '15-19' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '20-24' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '25-29' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '45-49' END AS AGE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS FEMALE FROM cap_citizen GROUP BY AGE UNION ALL SELECT 'TOTAL', SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12') FROM cap_citizen

QueryColumn.Name: AGE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '15-19' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '20-24' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '25-29' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '30-34' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '35-39' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '40-44' WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN '45-49' END AS

QueryColumn.Name: FEMALE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 19 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 20 AND 24 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 25 AND 29 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 30 AND 34 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 35 AND 39 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 40 AND 44 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 45 AND 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS
